message:
2018-12-22

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/11/18/cnn10/ten-content-mon/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1811/19/sn.01.html

개인적으로 오늘은 아마존 새 본부 이전 에피소드를 시청하는 것을 추천합니다. 아마존이 얼마나 미국에서 대단한 위상을 가진 기업인지 알 수 있음과 동시에, 각 주(state)의 유치 경쟁에 대해서 죄수의 딜레마라는 경제학적 개념도 등장해서 매우 흥미로웠습니다.

Personally, I recommend watching the previous episode of Amazon's new headquarters. And at the same time that you can see how much of a corporate status Amazon is in the United States, it's very interesting to see the economic concept of a prisoner's dilemma in each state's bidding war.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 03:35
U.S. President Donald Trump joins two California governors in surveying the damage.

03:35 - 04:30
As alcohol-related deaths spike in the U.S., researchers discuss possible reasons why.

04:30 - 09:10
Amazon prepares to set up new bases in two U.S. cities.
